snippet.title: Amber Heard Destroyed Her Own Life
snippet.description:
Amber Heard Destroyed Her Own Life

✅ Subscribe to Viral Film Talk 👉 https://rebrand.ly/t6e2tmk
🔔 Turn on notifications to never miss a new upload!

WATCH NEXT 👇
Amber Heard's Lawyer Quits And Exposes Her For Ruining Johnny Depp's Career
https://youtu.be/eJHyMaerh3k

Related Videos:

Johnny Depp's Friends Reveal How Amber Heard Destroyed Johnny Depp
https://youtu.be/q1xhgd6F_j4

Johnny Depp Lawyers Just DESTROYED Amber Heard!
https://youtu.be/2HBoBIsYHoE

SHE DESTROYED HER OWN CAREER" Johnny Depp Speaks on Amber Heard | Celebrity Craze
https://youtu.be/BgEtN_tF-Tg

Number 8: The Beginning 
 A lot of things have happened and recently, it has come to light that Amber Heard’s entertainment career might be over quicker than you say “Jack”. This is because it has been reported that she is going to be removed from Aquaman 2. Not only that she is going to be kicked out from the cast of Aquaman 2, but she is also losing a contract with L'Oreal Paris. 

Number 7: The Scheme
As we all know, Amber Heard had recently set up a seemingly unbreakable scheme against Johnny Depp in an attempt to ruin his life but this plan was foiled when some evidence was brought forth in court showing that Johnny Depp was indeed the one being wronged. Audio text messages, lost chats, and other pieces of evidence were brought to light and this has exonerated Johnny Depp greatly. Because of this, there is a high chance that Amber Heard will be sent to prison for three years if she is found guilty, although I think she's going to be found guilty. 

Number 6: The Petition
Of recent, the petition that was signed for her to be kicked out of Aquaman has reached over 400,000 signatures and has almost clinched the 500,000 thresholds. With all this, it is not a shock that Johnny Depp's fans are seeking Justice against Amber Heard. She also said that her career was heavily damaged and she had received multiple threats from a lot of people which made her change her phone number many times.  

Number 5: The Rising Star 
Although Amber Heard's entertainment career started in 2003 when she starred in two music videos and also showed up in some movies, her career took a great leap in 2015 when she married Johnny Depp. During that time, she had four major roles in four different huge movies. She starred in movies like Magic Mike XXL, The Danish Girl, The Adderall diaries, and last but not least, the popular musical drama known as One More Time. Her career skyrocketed even more after this. In 2017, she joined the DCEU also known as the DC extended universe and was cast as Aquaman's queen in Justice League. 

Number 4: Johnny’s Testament 
Johnny Depp also testified that he knew Amber Heard had a plan to come after his fame and money. He said she was incredibly beautiful and she showed some interest in him which made him fall for her. He said she tricked him with what appeared to be love but he later realized that she had a plan of her own. 

Number 3: The Analysis 
A lot of her videos were analyzed in court by so many body language analysts who proved that she was indeed lying. If you watch some of the videos, you will notice that during some interviews, she rolled her eyes and smiled as she talked about hitting Johnny Depp. She denied she ever hit him and if you watch the video closely you would notice that the way she was behaving was strange. 

Number 2: The Website and the Anonymous Personality 
Have you heard about the news and entertainment website known as LatestLY? Well, an anonymous source posted saying that Amber Heard failed her physical examination. This is also mentioned that she added some weight and was in bad shape and that the contract that was signed by her required her to be in good form in Aquaman 2. The claim went viral and Ryan Parker; an editor for Hollywood reporters went on Twitter and mentioned that he was informed by a reliable source that the rumors of Amber Heard being kicked off Aquaman 2 were all lies.

Number 1: Bad Reputation
A lot of people mentioned that the main reason Amber was not popular in Hollywood was that she has a bad reputation. It was also brought to light that the only sensible role Amber has ever gotten was the role of Mera in Aquaman. She also had not-so-great roles in movies like Magic Mike XXL and The Danish Girl. She also made a name for herself being an advocate for people who suffered from what Johnny suffered and this is a huge reason people did not believe Johnny Depp was who Amber Heard claimed he was. A lot of people also said that Amber Heard gave them bad vibes when talking to her.

No matter what content you're seeking, we'll bring it to you. Just contact us if you want a celebrity, tv shows, or movies featured on the channel.
